backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing CRUD operations for articles, X posts, spotlights, wisdom entries, resources, and cybercrime articles using Map storage with timestamp-based sorting and ID generation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence features related to fixing broken article upload functionality in AddArticleDialog, verifying mutation invocation in useQueries.ts, and ensuring actor initialization checks.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files describing components with enhanced logging, white text color fixes for dark mode visibility, and React Query hooks for backend operations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables including background, foreground, card, and sidebar colors with pure white foreground in dark mode.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag and root div mounting the React application titled 'Connect the Dots.ICP'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component with tab-based navigation, hero section with ICP branding, content rendering based on active tab state, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/AddArticleDialog: Dialog component for adding articles with comprehensive logging throughout submission flow, file upload handling with progress tracking, ExternalBlob conversion, mutation invocation with mutateAsync, and detailed error handling.
frontend/src/components/AddCybercrimeArt: Dialog component for adding cybercrime articles with title, URL, and thumbnail image upload. Includes upload progress tracking and form validation with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AddResourceDialo: Dialog component for adding trusted resources in the ICP ecosystem with name, description, and URL fields. Handles form submission with validation and success/error feedback.
frontend/src/components/AddSpotlightDial: Dialog component for adding ecosystem spotlights with title and content fields. Provides form handling with validation and toast notifications for success/error states.
Dialog component for adding investing wisdom quotes with quote and author fields. Includes form validation and mutation handling with user feedback.
frontend/src/components/AddXPostDialog.t: Dialog component for uploading X (Twitter) post screenshots with optional description. Features image upload with progress tracking and ExternalBlob handling.
frontend/src/components/CybercrimeAwaren: Displays a grid of cybercrime awareness articles with thumbnails and external links. Includes loading skeletons, empty state, and integration with AddCybercrimeArticleDialog.
frontend/src/components/EcosystemSpotlig: Displays a list of ecosystem spotlight posts with title, content, and timestamp, featuring add/edit functionality via dialog and loading skeletons.
Renders a grid of motivational quotes with authors in card format, includes add functionality and loading states.
frontend/src/components/LatestProgress.t: Shows a grid of article cards with thumbnails, titles, and external links, with add dialog and skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/components/NavigationMenu.t: Dropdown menu component with six navigation items (progress, xposts, spotlight, wisdom, resources, cybercrime) that controls active tab state.
frontend/src/components/TrustedResources: Displays trusted ICP ecosystem people/resources in a grid with name, description, and profile links, includes add dialog.
frontend/src/components/XPosts.tsx: Gallery view of X (Twitter) post screenshots with optional descriptions, featuring image display and add functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages backend actor instances based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with AuthClient integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on all content types (Articles, XPosts, Spotlights, Wisdom, Resources) with extensive logging for debugging backend actor calls.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark ICP-themed UI, ensuring white text in dark mode and proper input/textarea visibility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point wrapping the App with QueryClientProvider for React Query and InternetIdentityProvider for ICP authentication.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme with OKLCH color system, custom fonts (Inter, JetBrains Mono), glow shadows, and ICP-themed animations for futuristic UI.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining a six-tab ICP resource hub with known issues including broken menu visibility and article upload functionality regression.
